properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ry Mpanjakam-boninahitra
He ! midera Anao,
Izahay 'zay very lavitra
Fa naverinao

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ekeonao, ry Ray, (ry Ray)
Ekeonao, ry Ray, (ry Ray)
Ny saotra aterinay
Ho mandrakizay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Zanak'ondry, misaotra Anao,
Faly, ravo ery
'Reto olona navotanao
Tany Kalvary.
Ekeonao ry Ray, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ry Fanahy Mpanavao ny fo
Eny, raisonao,
Ny fisaorana eram-po tokoa
Mendrika Anao.
Ekeonao ry Ray, sns.
